p.k: On a visit to Cape Canaveral, the Tennyson Trio attend the launch of an experimental space plane. When Vilgax highjacks the ship, Ben must stop him from weaponizing the shuttle. / After stumbling upon a cute cat-dog-rabbit creature hybrid or Cadobbit Ben ignores Grandpa Max's advice and sneaks the animal onto the Rust Bucket. / Ben and Billy Billions go head to head over a Sumo Slammer Set sold exclusively inside the world's largest shopping centre, only to find six-year-old Simon Sez has gotten it first! / Aboard the SS Pettigrew, Ben must not only battle seasickness but Steam Smythe, who looks to use his mechanical creatures to sink the steamship's modern replacement. / After their attempt to get a photo with every storefront mascot is foiled, Ben and Gwen sneak out at night to get their photo with the wooden bear totem known as "Yawk".
